name: Daily Commodity Futures Bollinger/RSI Mean Reverter
description: Mean-reversion strategy that trades continuous Gold (GC) and Crude Oil (CL) futures on daily bars. Long when price closes below lower 20-day Bollinger Band and RSI(14) <30. Short when price closes above upper band and RSI>70. Exit at Bollinger mid-line (20-day SMA) or earlier via 1.5 % stop-loss or 3 % take-profit. Risk per trade limited to 2 % of portfolio.
